column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I really dislike steak houses. A good steak is not worth the sacrifice of the tacky ambiance
column3: and the mediocre sides and seafood that I associate with traditional Chicago steak houses. While Bavette's is indeed
column5: a steak house (and will probably still appeal to anyone who is a steak house fan)
column6: there were definitely no sacrifices required here.
